title: Lancer Baseball Camps Announced
text:
Lancer Baseball Camps Announced 0 comments 
The Mount Marty College baseball team has announced the schedule for its fall and preseason hitting camps. Both will offer instruction from MMC coaches and players. 
The fall hitting camp will run Sundays from Nov. 1 to Dec. 6. Sessions for grades 2-3 will run from 6:15-7 p.m., with grades 4-5 from 7-7:45 p.m., middle school (grades 6-8) from 7:45-8:30 p.m. and high school from 8:30-9:15 p.m. 
The preseason hitting camp will run Tuesdays from Jan. 26-March 1. Sessions for grades 2-3 will run from 6:15-7 p.m., with grades 4-5 from 7-7:45 p.m., middle school (grades 6-8) from 7:45-8:30 p.m. and high school from 8:30-9:15 p.m. 
Participants will need to bring running shoes (no cleats) and bats, if available. Batting gloves are recommended. 
There is a cost to participate. For more information or to register, go online to www.mmcbaseball.com .
